:::{#jaron-heading}
I'm an Assistant Research Professor - Biostatistician working at the [City of Hope - Beckman Research Institute - Department of Population Sciences](https://www.cityofhope.org/research/beckman-research-institute/population-sciences).

I'm passionate about using statistics, data science, and software development to advance cancer research and improve public health.
